StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Athlete
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a professional athlete at an early age. Thanks to [PAWN_possessive] skills, [PAWN_pronoun] was able to leave [PAWN_possessive] homeworld and enroll in a glitterworld university. But because of [PAWN_possessive] demanding schedule and introverted nature, [PAWN_pronoun] became socially inept.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Class clown
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: In the ultra-competitive environs of [PAWN_possessive] glitterworld school, [PAWN_nameDef] always played the class clown to diffuse tension. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a sense of social desperation from this, as well as an appreciation for the artistic side of comedy.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld kid
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: The child of genetically-engineered "perfect mates" on a glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was much more shy, withdrawn and nervous than [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] kept mostly to [PAWN_objective]self, studying science and medicine and taking on gardening as a hobby.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Pampered child
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born on a decadent glitterworld, [PAWN_nameDef] was given every expensive toy. This pampered lifestyle caused [PAWN_objective] to miss many basic life lessons, and didn't allow [PAWN_objective] much chance to mature socially.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Artisan farmer
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up on [PAWN_possessive] family's glitterworld farm. Theirs was one of the last farms on the planet to use traditional farming methods rather than glitterworld technology.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Glitterworld nerd
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] loved technology almost from the day [PAWN_pronoun] was born. [PAWN_possessive] was so obsessed with technology, though, that [PAWN_pronoun] never learned to appreciate the arts or culture.

StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.title: Reclusive prodigy
StoriesRetold.SRBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Growing up on a glitterworld afforded [PAWN_nameDef] the chance to fully devote [PAWN_objective]self to [PAWN_possessive] studies. Having developed a keen interest in medicine and genetic science at a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] had little time or desire for a "regular" childhood.
